highlights.d:
Don't let viewers drown your chat by spamming multiple short messages thanks to a new feature to merge consecutive messages of a user into one.
Works both on chat messages and channel point rewards.

Allow your viewers to click on your OBS sources or on custom shapes.

The Spotify overlay natively handles clicking on it to send the currently playing track on your chat so lurkers can keep lurking.

Heat is a desktop-only Twitch extensions allowing viewers to click on your stream. Twitchat makes it extremely dead easy to use it.

Enable any FX or play any Sample from channel point rewards, follows, subs, bits, ...

Scroll your chat from the encoders.

Execute any action when pressing any GoXLR button.

Change your viewers usernames or give them custom badges.
Automate these actions from the Triggers.

New trigger actions to enable the "beep" or play any sound of the soundboards.

Execute these actions from chat commands, channel point rewards, follows, subs, bits, hype chats,... Imagination is your limit!
New option to let you know if a chatter's account is less than a week old.

Planning to play a spoiler-sensitive game?

Automatically spoil all the messages of a user speaking on your chat for the first time.

Stop spoiling their messages at anytime.
To help you fill the 1:30 before a raid completes, open the new stream summary filled with data about your stream as well as a ranking of the most involved viewers.

Once you started a raid, a button will allow you to spamm the channel's link to your chat.

Help your friends getting Partnered by avoiding the parameter "referrer=raid" in the URL for the viewers accepting to use the link.

Create global variables to be used on the Triggers.
A trigger event will be triggered everytime a value is updated.

It had to happen!
But nothing changed on what was there before !
Only some new features are impacted.

In a way, Twitchat cost me ~$70.000, what I would've eared if I took a job instead of working full-time on Twitchat for a year and a half. I earned ~$5.000 from donations and I can't thank contributors enough üôèüíñ.
But I have little hope to earn more.
